title: Thil tha kan hmuh ang hi
lyrics:
Thil tha kan hmuh ang hi,
Tu man an hmu thei lo;
Kan Pa ram thil a ni,
Khawvelin an hmu lo.
Min then lo vang eng mah rengin,
Kan Pa hmangaihna ata chu.

A sanzia chhiar sen loh,
A thukzia sawi theih loh,
Hmangaih ropui kan hmu,
Aman chhiar sen rual loh;
Nangni Seraf thianghlimte u,
A ropuizia min hrilh thei em?

Khawvel a boral mek,
A duhna zawng zawng nen,
A thiltihtheihnate,
A ropuina zawng nen;
Lei pangpar hi a chuai si thin,
Ka Lalpa chauh a mawi ka ti.

Khawvel sum zawng zawng leh
A ropuina zawng zawng;
A mawina zawng zawngte,
Kan hmuh theih zawng ai hian,
Ka Lalpa hi a mawi ber e,
Hlinglukhumin phuar vel mahse.
